SELECT f.id,f.districtandcounty,f.cellname,f.longitude,f.latitude,f.cellpower, f.electronictiltangle,f.mechanicaltiltangle,f.totaldowntiltangle,f.azimuth,f.antennaheight,f.grid,'cell' `type`, f.cgi, c.coverf100, c.coverf110, c.coverf120,
IFNULL(s.sampleCount,0) sampleCount
,f.gnodeb enodeb
,f.enodeb ,f.coveragetype
FROM ${tableName} f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ${coverTableName} c WHERE c.date=(SELECT MAX(b.date) FROM ${coverTableName} b) ) c ON c.cellid=f.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) sampleCount,s.cellid FROM ${saoPinTableName} s WHERE s.date=(SELECT MAX(b.date) FROM ${saoPinTableName} b) group by s.cellid ) s ON s.cellid=f.id
WHERE f.grid=#{gridid}

SELECT s.id,s.cellid,s.rs rsrp,s.longitude ,s.latitude ,'saopin' `type` FROM ${tableName} s WHERE s.date=(SELECT MAX(s.date) FROM fourg_saopin_addr_mastercell s)
AND s.gridid=#{gridid}
